channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Hokianga-nui-?-Kupe to uncover the story behind the taniwh? ??rai Te Uru & Niua? who guard the mouth of Hokianga harbour. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Kura is furious that they have lost the godstick again and tries her best to stop her sister and Josh from making a deal with Hikuroa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamaiti T? Spring
channel.desc: The whanau are off to fetch water with Moeariki learning a valuable knot-tying skill along the way. A karakia honors the awa before the water pumps, and a haka marks the end of a job well done. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: NEW: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. We visit K?"?anapali Beach Hotel in Maui, Kohutapu Lodge and Tribal Tours in the Bay of plenty. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pukunati Lose Weight Or Die
channel.desc: They arrive in India. While Faren settles in, Roihana faces a devastating complication that could end the journey before it begins. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Why Apu?
channel.desc: Focuses on the erosion issue currently facing the Waiapu river. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: Nikora Edwards aka Swizl Jager, defies societal expectations in more ways than one and, through his music, explores the dynamics of not fitting the traditional mould. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Dragon Rider
channel.desc: A young silver dragon teams up with a boy and a mountain spirit to find the Rim of Heaven, a mythical safe haven. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025
channel.desc: The show made by Pacific people, for Pacific people - The Pacific voice on New Zealand television since 1987. (R).

channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.desc: P?p? Tei Nohotima shares waiata and karakia using r?kau, p?kura (short sticks) and t?t?t?rea (long sticks). (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aro
channel.desc: Aro Wairua - Nadine Anne Hura shares her journey travelling through the seasons of grief following the loss of her brother to suicide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aro
channel.desc: After Cyclone Hale hit Te Tai Rawhiti, local taiao warrior Graeme Atikns put out the call to come and clean up the beach at Tikapa. The clean up happened exactly one week before Cyclone Gabrielle hit. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: NEW: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing
channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hoiho Riding On
channel.desc: A great horse adventure across Aotearoa, meeting our amazing horses and riders of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: What was once a traditional love song becomes a celebration of universal love and connection in te reo M?ori, when iconic band The Black Seeds revisit their anthemic tune "?So True'. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: With calm weather on the horizon, Mori Rapana heads out with Nore Martin to target big kingfish for a feast, while Korey is deep in the ngahere to bring home the bacon. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haututu Hunters
channel.desc: Four city slickers get out of their comfort zones and connect with their whenua and wh?nau. Jordan takes the boys to meet his cousin Louis in ?akura for some fishing off the rocks. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: Commercial success made William Singe lose his sense of self. At his lowest point, Will turns to his whakapapa and finds the connection with his first te reo M?ori single: Wh?nau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: All Black hero Piri Weepu combines his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).

channel.title: Tipua

channel.title: Tipua
channel.desc: ?repa?s connection with her tipuna T?matak?rkiri is giving her new found strength and confidence, which is just as well given the danger she keeps finding herself in.

channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join presenters Te Aumihi Hohepa and Tawhanga Rika as they celebrate the world of M?ori art. Director Rangi Rangitukunoa shares details of the fascinating world of film and television production. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: M? Te Atea
channel.desc: Composer Greg Henderson explains to us the history of attacks on Waikato and how we must, to this day, stand together for the betterment of all. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: The celebrated singer Amanda Rheaume finds a powerful source of inspiration from the historical M?tis Scrip that attempted to displace her people and disrupt her culture. Directed by Shane Belcourt. (R).

channel.title: Te Hokinga Mai - The Return
channel.desc: The journey of M?ori reconnecting with their whakapapa and whenua. In the small coastal Hawkes Bay settlement of Waimarama people are returning home. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakanuia
channel.desc: A celebration of our finest people. Fun for all the whanau as we honour the life and times of our M?ori icons in a live studio special. (R).

channel.desc: LIVE: The 2025 NZSS Basketball Nationals live from Palmerston North Events Centre.
